summary: A test suite that validates the functionality and performance of the Stable Diffusion XL ControlNet pipeline, covering aspects such as attention slicing, controlnet conditioning, multi‑prompt handling, offloading strategies, prompt embeddings, IP‑adapter integration, component serialization, and fast denoiser mixture inference.
business_intent: Provide automated verification to guarantee that the ControlNet‑enhanced Stable Diffusion XL model operates correctly and efficiently, supporting rapid development cycles and continuous integration quality checks.
